name: Beef Mushroom with Broccoli
description: This Beef Mushroom with Broccoli dish is a healthful delight, perfect for those following a high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. It's a wonderful addition to your collection of healthy recipes, ensuring a guilt-free indulgence.

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the Beef Sukiyaki Meat and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the White Beech Mushrooms and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix together Coconut Amino, Salt, ground Pepper, Lemon juice, and Stevia to create a marinade.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced Beef Sukiyaki Meat to the marinade and let it marinate for at least 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a pan over medium heat and saut√© the marinated beef for 5 minutes or until browned.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the White Beech Mushrooms to the pan and cook for an additional 5 minutes or until the mushrooms are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the Beef Mushroom hot, garnishing with fresh herbs if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
